name: Super Nes Super Scope 6
overview: LazerBlazer makes you a sharp-shooter! The battle is upon you as you encounter an alien attack! With your Super Scope you must defend the planet against endless missiles and relentless alien ships. Use your radar to track enemies and anticipate their approach. The targets are in constant motion so a clear head and expert aim are required if you hope to succeed. Take up a different gunnery post in each mission. Blastris is a sure fire hit! With quick reflexes and a sharp mind you can set your sights on fun in three baffling puzzle games! In Blastrics A and B, your Super Scope becomes a tool of construction as your sculpt and spin puzzle pieces so they mesh. Mole Patrol is an exercise in rodent eviction with the emphasis on comic action.
